methods.name: where
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a WHERE clause to the query, created as {name} {comparison_operator} {value}. E.g. x = 'abc'.

name.description: The name of the object which is to be used in the comparison

comparison_operator.description: A string operator, according to which the comparison between compared object and the {value} is done, e.g. for "=", we get: {name} = {value}

value.description: The value which is compared against

methods.name: where_multiple
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a WHERE clause to the query, created from a list of given property filters.

filters.description: A Properties object that represents the set of properties to be filtered

comparison_operator.description: A string operator, according to which the comparison between property values is done, e.g. for "=", we get: property.name = property.value

boolean_operator.description: The boolean operator to apply between predicates

methods.name: where_literal
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a literal WHERE clause to the query.

statement.description: A literal string of the required filter
